entry.name: LogicMonitor_DeviceGroup_Alert_Statistics
entry.description: Tracks alert duration average over a rolling period of time.
entry.technology: User alert.analysis.period to define the rolling time period used in alert duration calculation(in days).

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: alertSize
datapoint.description: number of alerts used in MTTR average calculation

datapoint.name: averageDuration
datapoint.description: average alert duration in minutes based on rolling period.

datapoint.name: durationPeriod
datapoint.description: Period of time in days used to calculate alert duration. Default value is 1 can be overridden by setting the property alert.duration.period where needed.

datapoint.name: longestAlertDuration
datapoint.description: Longest alert in minutes based on current mttr period

overviewgraph.name: Top Devices by Alert Duration Average
overviewgraph.title: Top Devices by Alert Duration Average

overviewgraph.name: Top Devices by Resolved Alert Count
overviewgraph.title: Top Devices by Resolved Alert Count
